评论概述: So so soft on the inside against my skin
评论详情: I have extremely sensitive skin so I have to be really careful about what I wear. This sweatshirt is perfect, it's so soft on the inside. It's not really heavy against my skin but it does keep me warm. And I stay cold. To keep the letters on I was it wrong side out then hang it up to dry. After it's dry I put it in my dryer on the wrinkle free cycle just to get the wrinkles out and to soften it up, still while it's wrong side out to protect the letters. It's perfectly oversized, I did size up by 2 because I love really oversized sweatshirts. I definitely recommend this. I got the gray Brooklyn sweatshirt. I love it.
The sweater was super cute but the arms were ridiculously short and I have little arms so I retuned it
The color is definitely hot pink and the material is light but soft in the inside. I got a large and I love it!
I threw this on when it first arrived just to see it fit and it was super soft and cozy. However, I washed it ONCE and all the letters peeled off. Disappointing.
I love this sweater! It’s so comfortable. After multiple washes, it has not shrunk and the front image has not peeled any.

I’ve always loved a good oversized crewneck. It’s so comfy, perfect amount of fluff, and goes almost great with any outfit, jeans, sweats, shorts etc! But…After washing it 2-3 times the lettering is starting to pick up, and almost fall off. I was expecting better quality for the price. The lettering is almost like a cheap sticker. But overall, it’s very comfy. 8/10
Bought as a gift! Decal was perfectly centered and the material feels super nice!
The sweatshirt material is incredibly thin and the writing/logo on the front appears to be ironed on and is already peeling back. This would not last one wash. Will be returning

I have read the other reviews on this sweatshirt and do agree it's not very warm. However, it's the perfect type for me since I over hear easily. It fits great, too. Very comfortable and stretchy for room. If you're like me and get hot easily, then this shirt is for you.
This has only been thru two (gentle) wash cycles, and I’ve already lost the y and n. :( it’s very soft and cozy tho
This sweater is soooo good 😘 the inside is SOO soft and warm but it’s light weight. It’s so cute and you can we’re it with EVERTHING!!! It’s SOO cute 😫

Love it so much!  It’s super soft on the inside.  I feel it does run a bit large.  I’m 5’4”, 130 lbs & ordered the Medium.  I will be ordering another one!

I LITERALLY just bought this sweatshirt today. I sized up as recommended, it definitely is big. I think I could have just gone with my size. it looked so cute & cozy. I tossed it in the wash on delicate & now the letters are peeling off! I would have given it 1 star for this poorly made sweatshirt but the inside material was very soft & seems like it would be comfortable. ***** Update** So I returned the sweatshirt & the company sent me another one. I put it in the wash & deja vue again! Letters came peeling off. But it's so comfortable! It looks so tacky but the inside of it is sooo soft & nice. So for $25 I'll just keep it & wear it around the house.
